parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description: The ID of the ACK cluster or serverless Kubernetes cluster. You can obtain the cluster ID by calling the GetK8sCluster operation. For more information, see [GetK8sCluster](~~181437~~).

parameters.name: EnableAsm
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable the integration with Alibaba Cloud Service Mesh (ASM). Valid values:

*   true: Enables the integration with ASM.
*   false: Disables the integration with ASM.

parameters.name: NamespaceId
parameters.description: The ID of the namespace. It is in the format of `Region ID:Identifier of the microservices namespace`. Example: `cn-hangzhou:doc`.
